thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: Marianne
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Marianne

author: Marianne
title: Marianne
text:
My husband and I had shopped numerous stores for a new kitchen set, we tried Home Zone and found exactly what we wanted. Keith was very helpful and professional and followed up with our every need.
I will go back and see Keith should I need anything else for our home and will definitely refer my friends to him and Home Zone,
